channel.title: Comments on: Photography at the Capitol
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Not really. It was all pretty detailed instructions about what ISO settings to use in what situations, the pros and cons of the various modes on the camera, lighting and focus tricks, etc.
item.content:encoded: Not really. It was all pretty detailed instructions about what ISO settings to use in what situations, the pros and cons of the various modes on the camera, lighting and focus tricks, etc.

item.title: By: Marc

item.description: Can you briefly summarize some of the advice that the guy gave you?
